text: Jocelyne Saab (30 April 1948 - 7 January 2019) was a journalist and movie director from Beirut, Lebanon. Saab died on 7 January 2019 from endometrial cancer in Paris, aged 70.Décès de Jocelyne Saab, réalisatrice libanaise pionnière au Proche-Orient ==Movies== * 1975: Portrait d'un mercenaire français * 1975: Lebanon in a Whirlwind * 1976: Les Enfants de la guerre * 1976: Sud-Liban - Histoire d'un village * 1976: Pour quelques vies * 1976: Beyrouth, jamais plus * 1978: Égypte, la cite des morts * 1979: Lettre de Beyrouth * 1985: Adolescente, sucre d'amour * 1995: Kanya Ya Ma Kan, Beyrouth * 2005: Dunia ==Awards== * Nomination for Grand Prix des Amériques 2005. * Nomination for the Grand Jury Prize of the Sundance Film Festival 2006 == References == == Other websites == * Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from endometrial cancer Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:Lebanese journalists Category:Movie directors Category:People from Beirut
title: Jocelyne Saab
